author: alaperto
body: #### PR description: Development of Phase2 DQM, main focus on C-RACK. PositionOfClusters "2S Module" and "2S Ladder" plots: - Rename to include the number of Layer, Ladder and Module into title (avoid confusion) - "2S Ladder" plots for Phase2 OT Barrel (TB2S Layers 3, 4 and 5) with 12+12 modules, and for CRACK (6 2S Ladders) with 12 modules, different X axis range in dedicated cff for CRACK - "2S Module" plots restricted to C-RACK (too heavy for full Phase2 OT, switch false) activated in dedicated cff for CRACK Moreover: - New plot: Cluster per Barrel Layer - Uniform several OTDigi and OTCluster plots (title, name, axes, [cm], ...) with other Phase2 Tracker DQM plots - Dedicated workflow with /test .py files for C-RACK (D500 geometry, no Inner Tracker DQM steps) - Update of Phase2 DQM /test .py files (T35, D110) #### PR validation: Tested on C-RACK MC: output [DQM.root file](https://cernbox.cern.ch/s/suqfwoLD8oHmnY6) Tested on Phase2 Tracker: output [DQM.root file](https://cernbox.cern.ch/s/vQll9iCDSA0Sd1h)
title: C-RACK Phase2 DQM
